body: Thanks for the reply. I'll be running mostly energy simulations.  Mostly these: [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/TW14Rg5t5QWtLgNso5wI80locA3KcVVNGQrLatvsyD0-kh*weE1N1DBUcDOi66AT6NrUa9ea0sn*0bSSlSLHlztinzFvQGe0/Capture.PNG) I already have LB for Dynamo but HB is still under development right? I'll wait for the release of HB for Dynamo then?
